author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-FirstFarms 2017 EBIT Swings To Profit DKK 17.1 Million
text:
March 27 (Reuters) - Firstfarms A/S:
* REG-ANNUAL REPORT 2017 FOR FIRSTFARMS A/S
* FY 2017 EBIT RESULT AT DKK 17.1 MILLION * EARNINGS IN 2018 ARE EXPECTED TO BE STABLE FOR MILK- AND PIG PRODUCTION IN EU, HOWEVER CHALLENGED ON MARKET PRICES
* CROP PRICES ARE EXPECTED TO BE ON PAR WITH REALISED PRICES IN 2017
* ‍IN 2018, FIRSTFARMS EXPECTS AN IMPROVED EBITDA AND EBIT RESULT.​
* FY NET TURNOVER DKK 190.7 MILLION VERSUS DKK 130.3 MILLION YEAR AGO
* ‍EBITDA IS EXPECTED IN LEVEL OF DKK 49-53 MILLION AND EBIT OF DKK 22-26 MILLION IN 2018​
* ‍IN 2017, AN EBITDA OF DKK 43.7 MILLION AND EBIT OF DKK 17.1 MILLION IS REALISED.​
* ‍EARNINGS IN 2018 ARE EXPECTED TO BE STABLE FOR MILK- AND PIG PRODUCTION IN EU, HOWEVER CHALLENGED ON MARKET PRICES.​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
